attributes.action: Name any new changes to child protection law after BABY P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call upon the Government to allow any changes to the child protection law, in connection with Baby P's death, be named after Baby P.
 We at least owe BABY P this! , and changes have to be made, to protect our children. He was failed by the system,and is now another statistic! He was visited 60 times by social services and yet was left to die.This cannot happen again!  We want changes and dont want to be hearing "lessons will be learnt"" again!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Name any new changes to child protection law after BABY P."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19623


Prime Minister's Office
